alert.note: Alert for Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Tift (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 9:35AM EDT until June 19 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cook County in south central Georgia... Irwin County in south central Georgia... Berrien County in south central Georgia... Lanier County in south central Georgia... Lowndes County in south central Georgia... Eastern Brooks County in south central Georgia... Eastern Tift County in south central Georgia... Southeastern Ben Hill County in south central Georgia... * Until 1030 AM EDT. * At 935 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tifton to near Lenox to 8 miles west of Adel to 6 miles southeast of Pavo to 7 miles southwest of Boston to 14 miles northeast of Tallahassee, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Nashville, Lakeland, Valdosta, Ocilla, Hahira, Enigma, Ray City, Alapaha, Mystic, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Cecil, Barretts, New Lois, Gladys and Osierfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ben Hill; Berrien; Brooks; Cook; Irwin; Lanier; Lowndes; Tift
